definition: erhua variant of 傻帽[sha3 mao4]

sentences.english: Any dupe files will be deleted on sight.
sentences.chinese: 任何的傻帽兒文件將會在視力上劃除。

sentences.english: He was generally disliked and regarded as a pompous ass .
sentences.chinese: 他常不招人待見，而且被看作是個自負的大傻帽兒。

sentences.english: 'You probably think I'm being foolish, don't you?'
sentences.chinese: 你大概覺得我是個傻帽兒吧，對不對？
